footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Mualani | Update Date: 08/29/2024 | Editor: zmizuneko

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Surf's Up__
Mualani’s BiS, providing her with most buffs.
__Ring of Yaxche__
Best f2p weapon.
__Sarificial Jade__
Good at high refinements.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__A thousand floating dreams__
Good stat stick.
__Tome of Eternal flow__
Good stat stick.
__Prototype Amber__
Fine day 1 craftable.

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> HP%|<goblet> Hydro DMG Bonus%|<circlet> CRIT DMG

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental skill: Surfshark Wavebreaker
**2)** Elemental burst: Stormburst Shot

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value: Mualani’s main damage source is strictly HP scaling, meaning she neither needs, nor benefits from any ATK buffs. If you are using Obsidian codex artifact set and a CRIT Rate weapon, you are risking stacking too much CRIT Rate, making it a far less valued substat. Mualani’s Normal Attack: Cooling Treatment does not increase her Sharky bite’s damage. As such, it can be left at level 1.
